glosses: used to emphasize imperatives or suggestions

examples.text: Ayda yılda bir olsa da muhakkak ara / Azıcık zamanından ayır da / Öldün mü kaldın mı diye sor ara sıra / Adımı kalbine yaz beni unutma
examples.translation: Make sure to call me, even if it’s once a month or once a year / Spare a little bit of your time / And ask me sometimes, “are you dead? are you alive?” / Write my name on your heart, don’t forget me

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish محقق (muhakkak), from Arabic مُحَقَّق (muḥaqqaq), passive participle of حَقَّقَ (ḥaqqaqa).
